item.title: Refer a case to Painter Law Firm
item.description: $350,000 That’s the amount of the check for a referral fee I just signed before writing this message about medical malpractice referrals. That’s the amount for a referral fee in a case that had been turned down by five firms who were scared to tackle an emergency room case because of the willful and wanton negligence standard. That’s the amount for a referral fee in a case that I got policy limits from the ER practice group and millions more from the hospital.

item.title: Practice Areas
item.description: Our litigation practice is focused on the following types of cases. If you need a lawyer, contact us for a complimentary evaluation of your case. Medical Malpractice and Brain Injury According to a 2000 study by the National Institute of Medicine, as many as 98,000 Americans die and another million people are injured each year by preventable medical errors. When you go to a hospital or doctor for treatment, you are placing your life in their hands and trust them to know what they are doing.
